synopsis.text:
Without any memory or a sense of self, a man finds himself in the heart of a chilling, unfamiliar snow-covered landscape. Attacked by a grotesque insect-like creature, he is on the brink of despair until a stunning girl with animal ears and a tail, Kuon, comes to his rescue. She bestows upon him the name Haku, marking the beginning of their journey together.

As they travel through this mysterious world where humans possess animal-like features, Haku and Kuon forge new friendships and become entangled in the political affairs of the capital of Yamato. Haku's past remains an enigma, and the curious presence of a menacing red slime adds another layer to the growing list of mysteries.

With each step they take, Haku and Kuon delve deeper into the intricate web of Yamato's internal conflicts, all while seeking answers to the questions that surround them. Will they unravel the secrets of this strange world and Haku's lost past, or will the escalating tensions among neighboring countries consume them? Embark on a captivating journey in Utawarerumono: Itsuwari no Kamen, as Haku and Kuon challenge fate and seek the truth.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
